sent.orig: She'd made such promises before, and they lacked conviction/didn't carry much conviction.
sent.trans: 她以前也作过这样的许诺，但都不足信。

sent.orig: I had suddenly felt a chill conviction of danger, a shiver that suggested overwhelming evil.
sent.trans: 我突然感到确有危险而打了个寒噤——这是一种使人联想到灭顶之灾的惊颤。

sent.orig: Thus, alternative conviction is an exception or limitation in dubio pro reo.
sent.trans: 因而，择一认定属于罪疑唯轻原则的一个例外或是限制。

sent.orig: I will asseverate my conviction that she is guilty.
sent.trans: 我坚持有罪判决，因为她是有罪的。

sent.orig: The conviction doubtless showed in the cloud on her brow.
sent.trans: 毫无疑问，这信念表现在她紧锁的眉尖上。
